response.raw:
Here is my attempt at a memo for the task of performing financial calculations:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>
To: Accounting Department
From: [Your Name], Senior Bookkeeping Accounting And Auditing Clerk
Date: [Current Date]
Subject: Financial Calculations for [Client Name]
I have completed the following financial calculations for [Client Name]:
• Amounts Due: Reviewed outstanding invoices and determined [Client Name] currently owes a total of $[Amount], broken down as follows:
   - Invoice #[Number]: $[Amount] for [products/services], [Number] days past due
   - Invoice #[Number]: $[Amount] for [products/services], [Number] days past due
• Interest Charges: Based on our standard interest rate of [Percentage]% compounded monthly, the total interest owed on the past due balance of $[Amount] is $[Amount]. This was calculated as follows:
   - [Explanation of interest calculation, e.g. Principal x (1 + Interest Rate per period)Number of periods - Principal]
• Available Discounts: [Client Name] is eligible for a [Percentage]% discount if the total outstanding balance of $[Amount] is paid in full within the next [Number] days. This would reduce the amount owed to $[Amount].
• Remaining Principal on Loan: The original loan amount was $[Amount] at an annual interest rate of [Percentage]%. [Number] payments of $[Amount] have been made to date. The remaining principal on the loan is $[Amount].
Please let me know if you need any additional details on these calculations. I am happy to walk through them as needed.
[Your Name]
Senior Bookkeeping Accounting And Auditing Clerk
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
